description: General reasoning and logic test cases

cases.prompt: If all roses are flowers, and all flowers need water, what can we conclude about roses?
A train leaves Station A at 9:00 AM traveling at 60 mph. Another train leaves Station B (280 miles away) at 10:00 AM traveling toward Station A at 80 mph. At what time will they meet?
In a room of 23 people, what is the approximate probability that at least two people share a birthday? Explain your reasoning.
If it takes 5 machines 5 minutes to make 5 widgets, how long would it take 100 machines to make 100 widgets?
Calculate the sum of all integers from 1 to 100.
